errors.certificateNotValid: This is not a valid certificate
errors.ensureHashesEqual: Computed hash does not match remote hash
errors.ensureMerkleRootEqual: Merkle root does not match remote hash.
errors.ensureValidReceipt: The receipt is malformed. There was a problem navigating the merkle tree in the receipt.
errors.foundUnmappedFields: Found unmapped fields during JSON-LD normalization
errors.controlVerificationMethod: The identity document provided by the issuer does not match the verification method
errors.retrieveVerificationMethodPublicKey: The identity document provided by the issuer does not reference the verification method
errors.compareIssuingAddress: The provided verification method does not match the issuer identity
errors.invalidIssuingAddressCreationTime: The specified issuing address was created after the transaction occurred.
errors.invalidIssuingAddressRevoked: The specified issuing address was revoked by the issuer before the transaction occurred.
errors.invalidIssuingAddressExpired: The specified issuing address expired before the transaction occurred.
errors.invalidIssuingAddressUnknown: The address used to issue this Blockcerts does not belong to the claimed issuer.
errors.getTransactionId: Cannot verify this certificate without a transaction ID to compare against.
errors.invalidMerkleReceipt: Invalid Merkle Receipt. Proof hash did not match Merkle root
errors.invalidMerkleVersion: Merkle version used for signature is incompatible with Blockcerts version.
errors.isTransactionIdValid: Cannot verify this certificate without a transaction ID to compare against.
errors.issuerProfileInvalid: retrieved file does not seem to be a valid profile
errors.parseIssuerKeys: Unable to parse JSON out of issuer identification data.
errors.checkImagesIntegrity: Image integrity verification proved that the content was modified after issuance.
